description: All but emergency cancer surgery is cancelled to increase the Isle of Man's intensive care capacity.
title: Coronavirus: Cancer surgery halted to increase Manx intensive care capacity
title_page: Coronavirus: Cancer surgery halted to increase Manx intensive care capacity - BBC News
maintext: He added that the action "has been taken on firm clinical advice and consultation with our clinical base and also public health, and we would be looking to support any cancer patients affected as best we can".
